cookieConsentMessage: We use our own cookies as well as third-party cookies on our website to enhance your experience, analyze our traffic, and for security and marketing. For more info, see our
cta.heading: Start helping now.
cta.text: With the impactMarket mobile app you can engage directly with all communities, learn about their progress, and empower them out of poverty.
emailSubscribe.heading: Get updates about our progress, new features and impact measurement.
footer.note: impactMarket is an open, free, borderless, censorship-resistant, and transparent crowdfinance infrastructure to fight poverty. It operates on top of Celo protocol, uses cUSD (Celo Dollar) as the main underlying digital currency, and runs autonomously through smart contracts.
breakdown.airgrabReward.text: Retroactive compensation mechanism for past protocol participants
breakdown.contributionReward.text: For supporting vulnerable communities and empowering their beneficiaries out of extreme poverty.
breakdown.rewardsEstimation.text: This amount is representative at the moment. Final rewards calculation and allocation will happen once epoch ends. Your PACT rewards = Your contribution / Total raised * Available new PACT tokens.
breakdown.walletNotConnected.text: to view your PACT Balance and claim your Airgrab/Contributions Rewards.
modal.donate.PACTFooter: For example, by supporting now with {{ value }}, you would be able to claim {{ convertedValue }} at current block.
modal.donate.scanText: Scan or copy/paste the address below into your wallet. Only send {{ currency }} to this address.
modal.donate.text: Your donation will be used as reserve and converted to cUSD overtime to fund communities in urgent need and running out of funds.
monthlyActiveBackers: {{ value }} monthly active backers on {{ date }}
noCommunitiesMatchCriteria: There are no communities matching your criteria
noContrigutionRewardToBeClaimed: There are no contribution reward to be claimed.
page.community.dashboard.distribution.te: Beneficiaries from different communities can claim $cUSD on a regular basis from their community contracts. UBI parameters take into consideration their beneficiaries' basic needs, and assessment by local social organizations and community leaders.
page.community.dashboard.economic.text: Main indicators on beneficiaries' direct financial activity including volume transacted last month, number of transactions, and how many people they have reached/transacted with.
page.community.dashboard.fundraising.tex: Anyone can back those communities by sending $cUSD (Celo Dollar) directly to their contracts. This measures global monthly inflow, and its rate vs distribution.
page.community.dashboard.recentCommunity: This community was created less than 1 day ago and still doesn't have enough data to show charts. Please come back later.
page.fundraise.hero.countdown.label: This fundraising campaign will end in
page.fundraise.hero.heading:
Fighting poverty.
Together.
page.fundraise.hero.text:
Empower more than 20 thousand beneficiaries from vulnerable communities over the world through unconditional basic income distributed by our poverty alleviation protocol.

Your donation can make a difference for a family living in extreme poverty!
page.fundraise.hero.addresses.esolidar.l: Visit Esolidar crowdfunding campaigns to contribute using credit Card or Paypal
page.fundraise.hero.addresses.heading: Contribute to this fundraise!
page.fundraise.hero.addresses.text: After sending funds to this CELO wallet you will be entitled to claim IMPACT tokens.
page.fundraise.balance.heading: {{ amount }} raised! You can still make a difference!
page.fundraise.balance.text: By contributing 50 dollars, for example, you can support the basic necessities to 14 families in Venezuela for up to one week.
page.globalDashboard.communities.heading: Helping {{ communitiesCount }} Communities
page.globalDashboard.communities.ssi.tex: *SSI measures communities' collective financial self-sustainability, and average progress. It is inversely correlated with their beneficiaries UBI dependency/need and urgency.
page.globalDashboard.communities.text: UBI communities are usually managed and promoted by community leaders and social, governamental, or local organizations, who set up the initial UBI parameters, and add/remove which beneficiaries they believe would most benefit from it.
page.globalDashboard.demographics.toolti: This data is based on a self-reported sample size of {{ totalPercentage }}%
page.globalDashboard.distribution.text: Beneficiaries from different communities can claim $cUSD on a regular basis from their community contracts. UBI parameters take into consideration their beneficiaries' basic needs, and assessment by local social organizations and community leaders.
page.globalDashboard.economic.heading: Monthly Economic Development
page.globalDashboard.economic.text: Main indicators on beneficiaries' direct financial activity including volume transacted last month, number of transactions, and how many people they have reached/transacted with.
page.globalDashboard.fundraising.heading: Monthly Fundraising
page.globalDashboard.fundraising.text: Anyone can back those communities by sending $cUSD (Celo Dollar) directly to their contracts. This measures global monthly inflow, and its rate vs distribution.
page.globalDashboard.global.heading: Global dashboard
page.globalDashboard.global.text: Explore the main indicators of impactMarket system both on inflow of funds and distribution of basic income to beneficiaries through their UBI community contracts.
page.globalDashboard.healingMap.heading: Healing the world, ending poverty
page.globalDashboard.healingMap.text: Discover active communities and their beneficiaries’ activity on accessing/claiming a basic income that is empowering them out of poverty.

page.governanceToken.article.governanceT: Donec nec justo eget felis facilisis fermentum. Aliquam porttitor mauris sit amet orci.
page.governanceToken.article.makeYourVoi: Help shape the future of philanthropy by engaging in our governance discussions
page.governanceToken.article.voteOnPropo: Vote on our governance proposals at the impactMarket snapshot.org portal.
page.governanceToken.hero.heading: Help us reach our goal of alleviating poverty by 2030.
page.governanceToken.hero.text:
By donating to impactMarket, you not only directy fund communities of charitable UBI recipients, you also earn the right to participate in the future of the protocol through governance on the Celo network.

For example, by supporting now with {{ value }}, you would be able to claim {{ convertedValue }} at current block.
page.homepage.hero.heading: Decentralized Poverty Alleviation Protocol.
page.homepage.hero.text: impactMarket enables any vulnerable community to implement poverty alleviation mechanisms, like Unconditional Basic Income.
page.homepage.numbers.heading: Full transparency. No intermediaries.
page.homepage.numbers.text: The power of blockchain unlocks new possibilities both for donors to understand their impact, and beneficiaries to access finance.
seo.description: impactMarket enables any vulnerable community to implement poverty alleviation mechanisms, like Unconditional Basic Income.
seo.keywords: impactMarket, community, unconditional, basic income, beneficiaries, cUSD, UBI, contracts, allowance, celo, blockchain, infrastructure, system, protocol
seo.title: impactMarket - Decentralized Poverty Alleviation Protocol
